::Epyon/Hot Rod::

Epyon flips around the fire. He is now confedent, that he has regained
the upper hand here. He flies across shooting two optic laser beams at
SS.

Meanwhile Hot Rod takes this oppertunity, and shoots two missiles at SS,
unoticed.
"That's right, stay with Epyon. Leave you dragon ass wide open..."
